abilities.name: Lightning Trap
about: Throws a trap that launches a ring of projectiles through the enemy that set it off, dealing lightning damage to them and subsequent targets.

abilities.name: Fire Trap
about: Throws a trap that explodes when triggered, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies
Encounter leaves burning ground behind them

abilities.name: Bear Trap
about: Throws a trap that damages and immobilises a single enemy for a duration based on how much damage was dealt
